multiplechoiceresponse.p: To fix a broken secure channel what should you do?

choicegroup.choice: Disable the computer account and rejoin the computer to the domain.
Delete the existing computer account and create a new computer account.
Disjoin the computer account and rejoin the computer to the domain.
Reset the computer account and rejoin the computer to the domain.

div.p: Reset the computer account. When the secure channel fails, you should reset the computer account. By default, the netdom reset and Test-ComputerSecureChannel solutions will try to reset the password at the computer and domain level. If successful, a reboot is not required. If not, a reboot is required.
